Transform your outdoor space

Banning Hardscapes is a full service hardscape construction company that has been serving Delaware since 1995. We offer superior design and installation of patios, pergolas, walkways, retaining walls, and a variety of other outdoor features.

Find Out More

Let us design a retreat right out your back door!

Imagine coming home after a long day and being able to sit outsideÂ and enjoy the cool evening next to a radiant & luxurious firepit.
Or, how about enjoying a warm summer day under the gentle shade of a new pergola, all while sitting on a one-of-a-kind patio designed just for your space.

Whatever you're looking for, Banning Hardscapes can help you realize your dreams.
